channel.title: Magazine Recommends… on Magazine Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Magazine Recommends… on Magazine Blog

item.title: Black Secret Technology
item.description: It has come to our attention that we have so far only recommended albums from the mid-nineties. We aim to rectify this, but to round things off we’ll introduce you to one more. And it’s a gud’un.

item.title: Endtroducing
item.description: Its title is apt in that this is the first, and last, album by DJ Shadow.  Let me qualify that a little: Yes the artist has produced records since, and with more than a few fine tracks on them, but none were quite that album…

item.title: His 'N' Hers
item.description: …The great appeal of the album isn’t a particular sound though, - its it’s unbashed emotionalism. Soppy, almost gossipy, eyes pseudo angelically rolled to the heavens, tales of loss, love, lust and longing…

item.title: Americanah
item.description: On reading this book by popular author Chimamanda Ngozi Adiche one comes away with a sense of family, like being amongst a group of and sharing in their mores and vicissitudes. It is a rollercoaster ride of human journeys and for those with…
